content: आजिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [अजंत्यस्यां, अज्-इण् <ls>P. III. 3. 108</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab>] {@--1@} A battle, fight, combat; ते तु यावन्त एवाजौ तावांश्च ददृशे स तैः <ls>R. 12. 45.</ls> {@--2@} A fighting or running match; आजिं धाव् or इ, -अज् or सृ to run with or against any one for prize. {@--3@} Battle-field, place for running; race-course, level ground; शस्त्राण्याजौ नयनसलिलं चापि तुल्यं मुमोच <ls>Ve. 3. 9.</ls> {@--4@} Limit, boundary. {@--5@} A road, way ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}). {@--6@} An instant ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}). {@--7@} Abuse, invective.
